volume¶

class thermosteam.functors.volume.Yen_Woods(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create a functor of temperature (T; in K) that calcuates liquid molar volume (V.l; in m^3/mol) using the Yen Woods equation.

Parameters
Tcfloat

Critical point temperature [K].

Vcfloat

Critical point volume [m^3/mol].

Zcfloat

Critical compressibility [-].

class thermosteam.functors.volume.Rackett(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create a functor of temperature (T; in K) that calcuates liquid molar volume (V.l; in m^3/mol) using the Rackett equation.

Parameters
Tcfloat

Critical point temperature [K].

Pcfloat

Critical point pressure [Pa].

Zcfloat

Critical compressibility [-].

Rfloat

Universal gas constant [J/mol/K].
